snippet: Over 1,300 law enforcement officers took part in a crackdown on Tuesday on a South Los Angeles gang whose members are accused of murders.
abstract: Over 1,300 law enforcement officers take part in a crackdown on a South Los Angeles gang, arresting 50 members.
lead_paragraph: Over 1,300 law enforcement officers took part in a crackdown on Tuesday on a South Los Angeles gang whose members are accused of murders.

headline.main: California: Gang Members Arrested in Roundup
headline.print_headline: California: Gang Members Arrested in Roundup
